ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity is set as 'Closed Won', Closed Date can not be changed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR( ( $Profile.Name='Marketing User'), ($Profile.Name='Read Only'), ($Profile.Name='Solution Manager'), ($Profile.Name='Standard User'), ($Profile.Name='Xometry Sales User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Service User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Sales Leadership') ), ( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') && ISCHANGED( CloseDate )))
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date can not be changed for Closed Won Opps
